                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ID Checkpoint üéß Agent Said üë§ Customer Said Notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‚úÖ 6.1 Marro: Duo Pouch correctly defined (2 portions in 1) ‚Äî if applicable Not applicable.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      ‚úÖ 6.2 Marro: 90g = one portion (half-pouch) per day ‚Äî if applicable Not applicable.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        üìà Improvements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          üí∞

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Price & Transformation (The Showdown)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2‚úÖ 2‚ùå Partial 6.0/10 ‚ñº

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The agent explained the taster box and paused after the price reveal, but did not break down the price to a daily cost or reframe it as an investment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ID Checkpoint üéß Agent Said üë§ Customer Said Notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ‚úÖ 7.1 Taster Box Clarity ‚Äî Clearly explained 14 pouches / 14 days (or 1 portion/day for Marro) Taster box explained.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ‚úÖ 7.2 The 'Zip It' ‚Äî 2-4 seconds silence after price reveal (let customer process) Pause observed after price reveal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            üìà Improvements

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              üéØ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Clarity & The Close (Retention)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3‚úÖ 0‚ùå Pass 7.0/10 ‚ñº

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The agent clearly distinguished between the taster and subscription prices and provided a to-do list for the customer. No pushback was needed as the customer did not request a callback.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ID Checkpoint üéß Agent Said üë§ Customer Said Notes
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ‚úÖ 8.1 Box 2 Transparency ‚Äî Clear distinction between Taster Price and Subscription Price Clear distinction made.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ‚úÖ 8.2 The To-Do List ‚Äî Assigned homework ('Clear space in freezer' / 'Look out for email' / 'Download the app') Homework tasks assigned.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ‚úÖ 8.3 Handling 'No' ‚Äî If customer said 'Call me back', gave at least one polite challenge/pushback No pushback needed.
